title: Busted GTA Remaster Gets Big Patch, But How Did This Even Happen? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.30.21
description:
Go to http://purple.com/GAMES10 and use promo code GAMES10 to get 10% off any order of $200 or more!

Download the DraftKings app NOW and use promo code KINDAFUNNY to play free for millions.

Go to http://liquidiv.com and use code KFGD at checkout to get 25% off!

Gary and Tam talk about the GTA Remaster patch, and why Rockstar allowed the games to be released like this, as well as Halo Infinite updates, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:04 - Housekeeping
Our Hawkeye episodes 1 and 2 review is up on Youtube featuring Tim, Nick, and Kevin breaking down all their thoughts and feelings on the new Marvel show. That’s on Youtube.com/KindaFunny.
Today is Giving Tuesday, and we’re raising money for Project HOPE! What are we streaming? Well, Greg Miller’s coming back to stream Marvel’s Avengers with SnowBikeMike and see how Spider-Man plays on opening day! Check it out tomorrow after KFGD over on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:08:20 - GTA Trilogy Patch Fixes More Than 100 Bugs -- GameSpot, Eddie Makuch
00:25:40 - Halo Infinite XP Changes Announced -- GameSpot, Eddie MakuchHalo Infinite XP Changes Announced -- GameSpot, Eddie Makuch
00:33:34 -  Ad
00:36:50 - CD Projekt says it’s ‘way too early’ for Cyberpunk 2077 to come to Xbox Game Pass -- VGC, Tom Ivan
00:44:19 - Nintendo updates policies to increase push for diversity -- GamesIndustry.biz, Jeffrey Rousseau
00:46:50 -  Starfield has two ‘special step out into the world moments’, Todd Howard teases -- VGC, Tom Ivan
00:54:50 - Out today
